metadata.title: CVE-2012-2672 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Oracle Mojarra 2.1.7 does not properly "clean up" the FacesContextreference during startup, which allows local users to obtain contextinformation an access resources from another WAR file by calling theFacesContext.getCurrentInstance function.

criterions.comment: mojarra: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
